translated: one should extend the index finger of the left hand and place it at the base of the right arm.

original: g-yas pa'i mtheb chen gyis mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan te sor mo lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang nas phyogs bcur bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i mtheb chen gyis mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan te sor mo lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang nas phyogs bcur bskor bar bya'o //
translated: Pressing the nail of the little finger with the right thumb, and extending the remaining fingers, one should rotate in the ten directions.

original: aom badzra kro dha ma h'a tsanda /
analyzed: aom badzra kro dha ma h'a tsanda /
translated: Oṃ, vajra wrath, great fury,

original: bandha bandha / sha di sh'am h'um h'um phat phat /
analyzed: bandha bandha / sha di sh'am h'um h'um phat phat /
translated: bind, bind, in all directions, HŪṃ HŪṃ PHAṬ PHAṬ.

original: de nas 'di brjod nas rdo rje gsor bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas 'di brjod nas rdo rje gsor bar bya ste /
translated: Then, having recited this, one should brandish the vajra:

original: khro bo'i dngos grub dngos grub che //
analyzed: khro bo'i dngos grub dngos grub che //
translated: Wrathful accomplishment, great accomplishment,

original: dngos grub rgya chen dam tshig bstan //
analyzed: dngos grub rgya chen dam tshig bstan //
translated: the pledge of vast accomplishment,🔽the accomplishment of all deities,

original: lha rnams kun gyi dngos grub dang // bla med dngos grub bdag myur mdzod //
analyzed: lha rnams kun gyi dngos grub dang // bla med dngos grub bdag myur mdzod //
translated: may you quickly grant me the unsurpassed accomplishment.

original: khro bo'i rgyal po rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas h'um badzra phat /
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas h'um badzra phat /
translated: Having bound the root mudra of the king of wrathful ones, say hūṃ vajra phaṭ.🔽

original: blta zhing dam tshig sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: blta zhing dam tshig sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Having formed the root seal of the King of Wrathful Ones, one should look and give the pledge, saying, “Hum vajra phat!”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas nas khro bo dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas rdo rje khro bo rang gi lus la rab tu gzhug par bya'o //🔽aom pra bi sha kro dha h'um h'um h'um a'a:dzva l'a m'a l'a ku la bhi sha na badzra a'a:rang gi lus kyi nang du bsgoms te go cha la sogs pa byas nas thams cad 'dir rdzogs par bya ba'i don du snyim pas thal mo sbyar nas rdzogs par
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas nas khro bo dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas rdo rje khro bo rang gi lus la rab tu gzhug par bya'o // aom pra bi sha kro dha h'um h'um h'um a'a:dzva l'a m'a l'a ku la bhi sha na badzra a'a:rang gi lus kyi nang du bsgoms te go cha la sogs pa byas nas thams cad 'dir rdzogs par bya ba'i don du snyim pas thal mo sbyar nas rdzogs par
translated: Then, having made offerings to the Blessed One, one should form the seal of the descent of the wrathful one and cause Vajra Wrath to enter one’s own body,🔽saying, “Om prabhishakrodha hum hum hum aḥ.

original: bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
translated: Having visualized the garland of blazing flames within one’s own body and made the armoring and so forth, one should join the palms together in añjali and recite the mantra for the sake of completing everything here.

original: aom siddha badzra aa p'u ra ya aa p'u ra ya h'um phat /
analyzed: aom siddha badzra aa p'u ra ya aa p'u ra ya h'um phat /
translated: “Om siddha vajra apurya apurya hum phat!”

original: 'dis lhag chad thams cad yongs su kha bskong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis lhag chad thams cad yongs su kha bskong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all omissions and additions will be fully rectified.

original: de nas khro bo'i nga rgyal bskyed pas dngos grub thams cad 'gugs par byed do //
analyzed: de nas khro bo'i nga rgyal bskyed pas dngos grub thams cad 'gugs par byed do //
translated: Then, by generating the pride of wrath, one attracts all powers.

original: sngags 'dis phan tshun du khu tshur bcings te mthe'u chung gnyis po 'khyud par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags 'dis phan tshun du khu tshur bcings te mthe'u chung gnyis po 'khyud par bya'o //
translated: With this mantra, one should cross one's wrists, and embrace the two little fingers.

original: mdzub mo rab tu brkyang ste bkug nas cung zad bskyod par bya'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo rab tu brkyang ste bkug nas cung zad bskyod par bya'o //
translated: One should extend the index fingers, bend them a little, and shake them.🔽Oṃ vajra-roṣa mahā-krodha siddhy-ākāra hūṃ jaḥ.

original: aom badzra ro sha ma h'a kro dha sidhy'a ka ra h'um dza:de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge rnams bung ba nag po'i phreng me 'bar ba bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra ro sha ma h'a kro dha sidhy'a ka ra h'um dza:de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge rnams bung ba nag po'i phreng me 'bar ba bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
translated: Then, in one's heart, on a moon disk, one should imagine the syllables like a garland of black bees in a blazing fire.

original: h'um badzra phat /
analyzed: h'um badzra phat /
translated: Hūṃ vajra phaṭ.

original: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas khro bo'i sku spro ba dang bsdu bar byed par bsam par bya'o //🔽de'i yi @256a * //
analyzed: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas khro bo'i sku spro ba dang bsdu bar byed par bsam par bya'o // de'i yi @256a * //
translated: One should imagine the emanation and reabsorption of wrathful bodies from one's pores.

original: ge dang sems rtse gcig tu gyur pas so //
analyzed: ge dang sems rtse gcig tu gyur pas so //
translated: One's mind becomes one-pointed with those syllables.

original: bzlas pas ngal na khro bo'i sku rang gi snying ga'i nang du bsgoms te /
analyzed: bzlas pas ngal na khro bo'i sku rang gi snying ga'i nang du bsgoms te /
translated: If one is tired of recitation, one should meditate on the wrathful body in one's heart,

original: thal mo sbyar nas dngos grub thams cad zhu bar bya'o //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar nas dngos grub thams cad zhu bar bya'o //
translated: and with palms joined, one should request all powers.

original: siddhi badzra aa p'u ra ya sarba satv'a n'am /
analyzed: siddhi badzra aa p'u ra ya sarba satv'a n'am /
translated: Siddhi vajra apūrya sarvasattvānām

original: a'a pam sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha h'um dza:/
analyzed: a'a pam sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha h'um dza:/
translated: āpāya sarvasiddhiṃ me prayaccha hūṃ jaḥ.

original: de nas padma'i phyag rgyas mtheb chen gnyis po bskyod par bya zhing /
analyzed: de nas padma'i phyag rgyas mtheb chen gnyis po bskyod par bya zhing /
translated: Then, with the lotus gesture, one should move the two thumbs.

original: lha thams cad gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya dang / sngags ni aom s'a ra s'a ra /
analyzed: lha thams cad gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya dang / sngags ni aom s'a ra s'a ra /
translated: The mudrā and mantra for requesting the departure of all the deities are: Oṃ sara sara

original: bi sa ra bi sa ra /
analyzed: bi sa ra bi sa ra /
translated: visara visara🔽gaccha gaccha

original: gatstsha gatstsha / sarba de ba t'a na shr'i badzra dha ra sa m'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
analyzed: gatstsha gatstsha / sarba de ba t'a na shr'i badzra dha ra sa m'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
translated: sarvadevatān śrīvajra dhāraṇāyāpaya ti svāhā.

original: de nas rang gi lus la go cha byas te /
analyzed: de nas rang gi lus la go cha byas te /
translated: Then, having made the armor on one's body,

original: khro bo'i nga rgyal gyi yid kyis spyod lam ci bde bar bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i nga rgyal gyi yid kyis spyod lam ci bde bar bya'o //
translated: with a mind of wrathful pride, one should act as one pleases.

original: rim pa 'dis sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas myur du 'grub bo //
analyzed: rim pa 'dis sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas myur du 'grub bo //
translated: By this process, through reciting the mantra one hundred thousand times, one will quickly accomplish [the deity].

original: de nas sngags pas dbang bskur ba rjes su gnang ba byas te /
analyzed: de nas sngags pas dbang bskur ba rjes su gnang ba byas te /
translated: Then, the mantrin should perform the consecration and permission.

original: sngon du bsnyen pas rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgrub par 'dod pas zla ba gcig tu thun mtshams gsum du stong phrag re bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pas rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgrub par 'dod pas zla ba gcig tu thun mtshams gsum du stong phrag re bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One who wishes to accomplish the Vajra Holder through prior repetition should repeat one thousand times in three sessions for one month.

original: de nas bco lnga la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas /
analyzed: de nas bco lnga la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas /
translated: Then, on the fifteenth day, having made offerings according to one's means,

original: ting nge 'dzin la legs par gnas te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la legs par gnas te /
translated: one should well abide in meditative concentration.

original: khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings nas mtshan mo ril po bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings nas mtshan mo ril po bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: Binding the mudra of the wrathful one, one should perform repetition throughout the night.

original: de nas nang par snga bar sa g-yo ba'i phyag rgya 'bar te /
analyzed: de nas nang par snga bar sa g-yo ba'i phyag rgya 'bar te /
translated: Then, in the early morning, the mudra of the earth shaking will blaze.

original: 'bar ba tsam gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'bar ba tsam gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur te /
translated: By the mere blazing, one will become equal to the Vajra Holder.

original: rgas pa dang / 'chi ba med par lha'i lus su 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
analyzed: rgas pa dang / 'chi ba med par lha'i lus su 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One, the Vajra Holder, has said that one will attain a divine body without aging or death.

original: mdor bsdus pa yongs su rdzogs shing rgyas pa'i rim par gyur pa 'byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dam pa thams cad 'dren pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa yongs su rdzogs shing rgyas pa'i rim par gyur pa 'byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dam pa thams cad 'dren pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The excellent ritual of the concise, complete, and extensive method of accomplishing Vinayaka, which brings forth all, has been composed by Trailokya Vajra. It is complete.
